channel.title: I need a tut on this
channel.description: Someone told me how to do it before but I forgot how. I want to add like a shield int when someone atack's you the shield blocks like in real rs when you atk him shield blocks like real rs. How do I do this?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2007, 06:10:47 PM[/size][hr]Still need help.

item.title: I need a tut on this
item.dc:creator: @ugetpkd ugetpkd
item.description:
@ugetpkd wrote:

I don’t think it is going to work but worth a try.
I need the emote to even try it lol.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a tut on this
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

well ive never tried to do something like that but…

search for

public int GetBlockAnim(int id)

and put in the info like this

if(id == [shield id]) //[shield name]
{
return [id of emote];
}

and obviously replace the bracketed words with the correct info.
also this is a guess but it makes sense…

Read full topic
